content.eamr: ( ing-1 "1 pound fresh mushrooms, stems removed" )

content.text: 1 pound lobster tail, cleaned and chopped
content.eamr: ( ing-5 "1 pound lobster tail, cleaned and chopped" )

content.text: 0) Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "the oven"@11:19 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "375 degrees F"@23:36 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "190 degrees C"@38:51 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Brush a large baking sheet with about 1/4 cup of melted butter.
2) Arrange mushroom caps in a single layer over the baking sheet.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Arrange"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "mushroom caps"@11:24 / FOOD )
		:mnr ( "a single layer"@28:42 / OTHER )
		:gol ( tool-2-0 "the baking sheet"@48:64 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 3) In a medium bowl, mix together the crushed croutons, remaining 1/2 cup butter, shredded cheese, crabmeat, lobster and garlic.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "mix"@21:24 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "the crushed croutons"@34:54 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-0 "remaining 1/2 cup butter"@56:80 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "shredded cheese"@82:97 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "crabmeat"@99:107 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "lobster"@109:116 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "garlic"@121:127 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-3-0 "a medium bowl"@6:19 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Spoon into mushroom caps where the stems used to be.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Spoon"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:gol ( "mushroom caps"@14:27 / FOOD )
		:todo ( "where the stems used to be"@28:54 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, or until lightly browned on the top.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-5-0 "10 to 12 minutes"@12:28 / DUR )
		:loc ( tool-5-0 "the preheated oven"@32:50 / TOOL )
		:until ( cond-5-0 "until lightly browned on the top"@55:87 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Sprinkle with additional cheese if desired, and serve hot!
